about_the_game:
From seed to sorcery – grow known and unique crops and discover their magical evolutions in this enchanting farming game. Cultivate different types of non-magical and magical plants on your farm, separated in the categories crops, trees, herbs and flowers.



Breed animals beyond imagination – master the art of magical crossbreeding with 27 species, including elusive dragons. Can you breed all species?


Embrace love's variety - discover the joy of dating characters with different backgrounds and mindsets. Help them with their personal goals and problems and learn about their own story.



Rebuilding the world – restoring magic eases your farm life in a diverse world. The magic in the world has disappeared since a magical accident in the past. It's up to you to bring it back.



Craft your own destiny - pursue various activities from cooking to fishing to brewing magic potions. Discover a wide variety of recipes and the wide range of fish with different colors. Can you catch them all?



Diverse avatars, boundless possibilities – play as one of the 5 species and customize your character based on their style: Humans, Ki'shen, Elves, Drakys and Nereids.
Design your dream farm - let the decoration system shape your farm's allure. Paint your decor while decorating your farm and farmhouse.



Your new home is a farm near Dragonreath, which was known as a town full of magic and wonders. But a tragic catastrophe has changed everything.
Discover what happened in the past when a magical accident erased the magic from the world Hyldena. Due to the absence of magic, magical plants and creatures disappeared over time, leading to despair and starvation. The gods turned their backs on the living and vanished, while the people are trying in vain to adapt in this new world since then.
Maybe you can find a way to restore the magic and save everyone?


Hyldena is home to 5 humanoid species: Humans, Elves, Drakys, Nereids and Ki'shen. Dragonreath is divided into 3 areas, each led by one of the factions - the Shailyn-Order, the Sidus-Alliance and the Obsideran-Pact, where each of them are trying to restore the magic in their own way - without success.

short_description: Crossbreed magical animals, evolve crops, build relationships based on choices and find love without limitations. Play as one out of 5 species and shape your own enchanted farm paradise, while mastering rune carving and magic potions brewing, and restore the magic in a damaged fantasy world.
